alert.note: Alert for Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:11PM CDT until April 23 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN NOBLE AND CENTRAL PAYNE COUNTIES... At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Stillwater, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Yale, Glencoe, Lake Carl Blackwell, Quay, Lake Mcmurtry and Ingalls. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
